short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Cinemetrics Measurement Tool records data to analyze movies and publishes the gathered data for everyone to access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate average shot lengths for films. Use the "Frame Accurate Cinemetrics Tool" (FACT) to accurately capture and edit shot delimiters for a film on your computer, or use the "classic" tool to mark shots watching a video that is not on your computer.
